eventDecorators.name: Burn
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a Bank's capital is rebalanced.

eventDecorators.name: ContractCreation
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a Bank's capital is rebalanced.

eventDecorators.name: Locked
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a Bank's capital is rebalanced.

eventDecorators.name: Mint
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a Bank's capital is rebalanced.

eventDecorators.name: Transfer
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a Bank's capital is rebalanced.

eventDecorators.name: Unlocked
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a Bank's capital is rebalanced.

functionDecorators.name: burn
functionDecorators.description: Burn tokens. Remove `_value` tokens from the system irreversibly.

parameterDecorators.name: _value
parameterDecorators.description: the amount of money to burn.

functionDecorators.name: getLockedTokens
functionDecorators.description: Returns locked token info of a specified address for a given reason.

parameterDecorators.name: _of
parameterDecorators.description: The address whose tokens are locked.

parameterDecorators.name: _reason
parameterDecorators.description: The reason to query the lock tokens for.

functionDecorators.name: lock
functionDecorators.description: Locks a specified amount of tokens for a given time and given reason.

parameterDecorators.name: _reason
parameterDecorators.description: the reason why a caller locks his token(s).

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: the amount of token(s) to lock.

parameterDecorators.name: _lockedTime
parameterDecorators.description: the time in second for which the token(s) will be locked.

functionDecorators.name: mint
functionDecorators.description: Mint tokens. Create `_value` new tokens and credit them to a specified address This method can be called only by the owner of the contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _receiver
parameterDecorators.description: the address of the receiver of the new minted token.

parameterDecorators.name: _value
parameterDecorators.description: the amount of token to create.

functionDecorators.name: tokensUnlockable
functionDecorators.description: Returns unlockable tokens for a specified address for a given reason.

parameterDecorators.name: _of
parameterDecorators.description: The address to query the the unlockable token count of.

parameterDecorators.name: _reason
parameterDecorators.description: The reason to query the unlockable tokens for.

functionDecorators.name: transfer
functionDecorators.description: Send `_value` tokens to `_receiver` from your account. The caller of this function will be the sender of token This function can't be use to transfer token of a an other address that the caller's address.

functionDecorators.name: unlock
functionDecorators.description: Unlocks the unlockable tokens of a given address.

parameterDecorators.name: _of
parameterDecorators.description: Address of user, claiming back unlockable tokens.
